meanings.definition: A plan or scheme for doing something.
meanings.sent1: My projets for the weekend include cleaning my room and going for a walk.
meanings.sent2: She shared her projets for the new business with her team.
meanings.sent3: His projets to become a superhero were dashed when he realized he couldn't fly.
meanings.sent4: The projets to build a treehouse in the backyard soared to new heights.
meanings.sent5: The detailed projets for the school play made it a huge success.

meanings.sent1: The company's projets to expand globally were met with excitement.
meanings.sent2: The projets for the charity event were well-received by the community.
meanings.sent3: Their projets to break the world record for the longest handshake were ambitious.
meanings.sent4: The projets to create a time machine seemed like a fantasy.
meanings.sent5: The ambitious projets to climb Mount Everest inspired many.
